title: Alpha Client Issue
body: So with LCU client realeasing  i'm still having the same issue with it during it's early alpha stages as far as the client being too zoomed in on my monitor since it's pretty dated and wondering what's the solution to make the client fit on monitor

replies.body:
You can adjust the client's size at will by holding down **CTRL** and pressing the **+** button to increase the size or the **-** key to reduce the size of the client.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
It also happens to me cause my monitor is too small :( i cant even change masteries or type in champ select pliz help us :/
